directions: In a large pot combine the chicken, tomatoes with green chile peppers, potatoes, sausage, salt, pepper, garlic powder and water to cover. Put heat on medium low, stir all together and let simmer 1 1/2 to 2 hours or until potatoes are cooked through and tender.
ingredients: 2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into bite size pieces
1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers
title: Picante Chicken Stew
